channel.title: Posts on Ankit Gupta
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ankit Gupta

item.title: AWS Workshops Collection
item.description: AWS Workshops Collection Recently I am coming across a lot of good free AWS workshops. I am making a list here, so that I can do them and dump my learnings here. https://awesome-aws-workshops.com/

item.title: Good Reads Collection
item.description: Good Reads Collection Collecting good articles that I found over the period of time and small summaries about them. Imposter Syndrome @ Amazon In this article, an Amazon employee confessed how he shouldn’t be hired at Amazon in the first place. He lacked a lot of technical and leadership skills. But over the period of 2 years, he grew himself to be a worthy SDE-2. He did it by collecting constructive feedback from his peers and reflecting on them.

item.title: Blogging Begins!!
item.description: First Post So I have been trying to start a blog for so long. Precisely 2 long years. Since I started working at Amazon. My rate of learning has gone through the roof. I like gathering new ideas. Researching on them and apply them to my day-to-day life. In my humble opinion, this blog is a result of that only. I am a software engineer by profession. So, I am well aware of the fact to make something work through automation rather than just pushing out the door.
